mapper.select: SELECT A.BRANCH_NO AS branchNo , A.CREATE_TIME AS createTime , A.CREATE_USER AS createUser , A.MODIFY_TIME AS modifyTime , A.MODIFY_USER AS modifyUser , A.IS_USE AS isUse , A.CUST_CODE AS custCode , A.BANK_CODE AS bankCode , A.BRANCH_STATE_CODE AS branchStateCode , A.LOCAL_CODE AS localCode , A.SITE_NAME AS siteName , A.CLEAN_USER_NO AS cleanUserNo , A.BRANCH_ADDRESS AS branchAddress , A.SORT_ORDR AS sortOrdr , A.CHARGE_MONEY AS chargeMoney , A.PAY_MONEY AS payMoney , A.REMARK AS remark , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM T_CODE WHERE UPER_CODE = 600 AND CODE_ID = A.CUST_CODE ) AS custCodeName , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM T_CODE WHERE UPER_CODE = 400 AND CODE_ID = A.BANK_CODE ) AS bankCodeName , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM T_CODE WHERE UPER_CODE = 500 AND CODE_ID = A.BRANCH_STATE_CODE ) AS branchStateCodeName , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM T_CODE WHERE UPER_CODE = 300 AND CODE_ID = A.LOCAL_CODE ) AS localCodeName , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T_USER WHERE USER_NO = A.CLEAN_USER_NO ) AS cleanUserName FROM T_BANK_BRANCH A WHERE A.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo}
